DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate whether lacto-tripeptide Ile-Pro-Pro ( IPP ) improve function endothelium patient coronary artery disease . The study crossover design . Participants treat protein hydrolysate rich IPP 12 week placebo 12 week four-week rest period treatment period . The investigator use ultrasound test function endothelium brachial artery , 6 week , 12 week treatment . Blood collect treatment . The investigator hypothesize IPP improve endothelial function .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Ile-Pro-Pro ( IPP ) Endothelial Function Patients With Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: Coronary artery disease Treatment ACE inhibitor ARB Pregnancy Other major illness Treatment investigational drug within 4 week
